description: Ms. codex. Title from leaf 2a. Physical description: 18 lines per page; written in naskh in black on glazed, laid European paper. Original text in red. Mild staining. Origin: Likely first half of the 19th century, by Muḥammad ibn al-Ḥusayn al-Burūjirdī (leaf 186a). Incipit: الحمد لمن اصول نعمائه ظاهرة
author: Māzandarānī, Muḥammad Ṣāliḥ ibn Aḥmad, -1675 or 1676
abstract: Commentary on Bahāʼ al-Dīn al-ʻĀmilī's Zubdat al-uṣūl.
extent: 186 leaves : paper ; 216 x 151 (151 x 88) mm bound to 216 x 158 mm
provenance: Owner's note on leaf 1a. Owner's note and stamp on leaf 2a, dated 1265 H [1848 or 1849].
dlme_provenance_en: Owner's note on leaf 1a. Owner's note and stamp on leaf 2a, dated 1265 H [1848 or 1849].
